story_parts.text: I was never very good at school. My mom always had to help me with my homework and I always felt like I was behind everyone else. So, when I was told I was being held back in 2nd grade, I wasn't too surprised. I was actually kind of relieved. I thought maybe this would be a chance for me to catch up. But things didn't go the way I wanted them to. Instead of getting better, I just got worse. My grades slipped and
next_options: I was eventually held back again in 3rd grade
I was never held back again, but I never felt like I was really good at school either
